name: JustSurviveIt!
description:
This is a prototype for a game, let me know what you think please!

E to the left mustang car handle = enter the car

E to the Red button inside car = exit the car

E = Interact

WASD = Movement

Space = Jump

The goal is just to survive the 2 scenes, I'll try to add more in the future if anyone likes this. It can run on almost anything.

Media:

Any comment or suggestion you can join the discord here: https://discord.gg/suxewKR5HQ Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3u8eyqvrOpXmzunHfoS02Q
